show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Untold History
content:
Mickey Huff  and Peter Phillips revisit untold histories of the United States as they play excerpts from the Untold... <!--more--> History event held at the Grand Lake Theater in Oakland, CA in February with Oliver Stone, Peter Kuznick, and Daniel Ellsberg.
  They also interview Laurel Krause just back from the 43rd anniversary of the May 4th Kent State Shootings where Oliver Stone was keynote speaker.
They discuss the ongoing cover-up of that fateful event by federal, state, and university officials.
Additionally, they hold a general discussion on the importance of untold history to an active democracy.
